n = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

p = [0] * n
p[0] = q[0]
for i in range(1, n-1):
    p[i] = p[i-1] + q[i]
p[n-1] = p[n-2] + q[n-2]

if max(p) > n or min(p) < 1:
    print(-1)
else:
    print(*p)

n = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

p = [0] * n
p[0] = q[0]
for i in range(1, n-1):
    p[i] = q[i] + p[i-1]
p[n-1] = p[n-2] + q[n-2]

if min(p) < 1 or max(p) > n:
    print(-1)
else:
    print(*p)

n = int(input())
q = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

if n == 2:
    print(1, 2)
    exit()

if sum(q) != 0:
    print(-1)
    exit()

if max(q) > 0:
    print(-1)
    exit()

if min(q) < 0:
    print(-1)
    exit()

p = [0] * n

p[0] = 1
p[1] = 1 + q[0]

for i in range(1, n - 1):
    p[i + 1] = p[i] + q[i]

if min(p) < 1:
    print(-1)
    exit()

if max(p) > n:
    print(-1)
    exit()

print(*p)
